subject: Simsonn Pro Shifter Delivery
description_text:
Hi.

I have preorder for the new shifter and I haven’t seen any shipping updates. When are these expected to ship?

I saw it was December 14th then December 19th delay but haven’t seen anything yet.

Thanks,
Daminick

conversations.body_text: Hi Daminick Cavan,    The 2-in-1 shifter will start shipping from today. There has been a slight adjustment to the delivery schedule due to changes in some components.
